bibl.bibl: Hooker, William Jackson. 1849. Niger flora; or, an enumeration of the plants of western tropical Africa collected by the late Dr. Theodore Vogel… including Spicilegia Gorgonea, by P. B. Webb … and flora Nigritiana, by Dr J. D. Hooker … and George Bentham. London: Hippolyte Bailliere. Paris: J. B. Bailliere. Madrid: Bailly Bailliere.
